_description: On the Fall and Redemption — seven lines in a complex pattern of end of line rhyme and internal rhyme

Bod26.First Lines:
Adam alas and waylaway aluþer dede dedest þou þat
                    day…
Bod26.Last Lines:
…þat schal brynge hym & alle hysein to ioye and
                    blisse habbynge
